posts.post_content:
I decided to give up on collecting these to concentrate on other areas, these are the last 5 cards I have:

John McGraw- front is vg+, back has paper loss, no creases

George Bell- I would grade this card good, with 2 minor creases

William Bransfield- poor

Topsy Hartsel- poor

George McBride- poor

Sorry no scans, asking $50 shipped. Check or money order.

I'll take them.
Email forthcoming.

Doug
